data.value: Specifies if the user can hide the field by dragging it outside of the data presenter.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_AllowHidingViaFieldChooser
data.value: Specifies if the user can hide the field by dragging it outside of the data presenter.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_AutoSizeOptions
data.value: Returns or sets what values are considered when autosizing a field.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_AutoSizeScope
data.value: Returns or sets a value that indicates which records are evaluated when performing an autosize of a field.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_DataValueChangedHistoryLimit
data.value: Returns/sets the maximum number of value changes to maintain for all Cells associated with the Field.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_DataValueChangedNotificationsActive
data.value: Returns/sets whether DataValueChanged and InitializeCellValuePresenter events should be raised for all Cells associated with the Field.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_DataValueChangedScope
data.value: Returns/sets a value that determines the range of DataRecords for which DataValueChanged and InitializeCellValuePresenter events will be raised.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_Height
data.value: Returns or sets a FieldLength instance that represents the default height of the field.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_SupportDataErrorInfo
data.value: Specifies whether to display field error information provided by IDataErrorInfo.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_Width
data.value: Returns or sets a FieldLength instance that represents the default width of the field.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_NonSpecificNotificationBehavior
data.value: Determines if values are refreshed when a notification is received that a change has occured for a DataRecord but the notification doesn't specify which field values have been changed.

data.name: LD_GroupByAreaMulti_P_ConnectorLinePen
data.value: Gets/sets the Pen that will be used for drawing connector lines between fields

data.name: LD_GroupByAreaMulti_P_FieldLayoutDescriptionTemplate
data.value: Returns/sets the DataTemplate to use for the FieldLayout description element.

data.name: LD_GroupByAreaMulti_P_FieldLayoutOrientation
data.value: Gets/sets how fieldLayout information is orientated (read-only)

data.name: LD_GroupByAreaMulti_P_FieldLayoutOffsetX
data.value: Gets or sets the amount to offset between FieldLayoutGroupByInfos in the X dimension.

data.name: LD_GroupByAreaMulti_P_FieldLayoutOffsetY
data.value: Gets or sets the amount to offset between FieldLayoutGroupByInfos in the Y dimension.

data.name: LD_GroupByAreaMulti_P_FieldOffsetX
data.value: Gets or sets the amount to offset between Fields within a FieldLayout in the X dimension.

data.name: LD_GroupByAreaMulti_P_FieldOffsetY
data.value: Gets or sets the amount to offset between Fields within a FieldLayout in the Y dimension.

data.name: LD_FieldChooserGroup_P_FieldFilter
data.value: Used to filter fields to form the subgroup of fields.

data.name: LD_FieldChooserGroup_P_FieldLayout
data.value: Associated FieldLayout.

data.name: LD_FieldChooserGroup_P_HasFieldFilter
data.value: Indicates if FieldFilter property value is non-null.

data.name: LD_DataRecordPresenter_P_DataError
data.value: The record data error (IDataErrorInfo.Error).

data.name: LD_DataRecordPresenter_P_HasDataError
data.value: Indicates if the record has data error (IDataErrorInfo.Error).

data.name: LD_GridViewSettings_P_UseNestedPanels
data.value: Determines how items panels are used to display hierarchical data.

data.name: LC_Layout
data.value: Layout

data.name: LD_CardHeaderPresenter
data.value: An element used to represent the header area of a Card.

data.name: LC_CardsControl Properties
data.value: CardsControl Properties

data.name: LD_CardHeaderPresenter_P_Card
data.value: Gets/sets the CardViewCard that contains the header.

data.name: LD_CardView_P_ViewSettings
data.value: Returns/sets the CardViewSettings object for this CardView.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_AllowCardWidthResizing
data.value: Returns/sets whether the end user can resize Card widths by selecting the right edge of card and dragging.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_AllowCardHeightResizing
data.value: Returns/sets whether the end user can resize Card Heights by selecting the bottom edge of card and dragging.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_AutoFitCards
data.value: Returns/sets whether Card widths/heights are automatically increased to use up all available horizontal/vertical space.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_CardHeight
data.value: Returns/sets the Height of each Card.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_CardWidth
data.value: Returns/sets the Width of each Card.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_CollapseCardButtonVisibility
data.value: Returns/sets whether a button is displayed in the Card header which can be clicked by the end user to collapse a Card so it shows its header only.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_CollapseEmptyCellsButtonVisibility
data.value: Returns/sets whether a button is displayed in the Card header which can be clicked by the end user to collapse cells that contain empty values (e.g. empty string/null for string, null for nullable types, and 0 for numeric types).

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_HeaderPath
data.value: Returns/sets a string that represents the Path to a value on the source object that should be displayed as a Card header.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_HeaderVisibility
data.value: Returns/sets the Visibility of the Card header.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_InterCardSpacingX
data.value: Returns/sets the horizontal spacing between each Card.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_InterCardSpacingY
data.value: Returns/sets the vertical spacing between each Card.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_MaxCardCols
data.value: Returns/sets the maximum number of columns of Cards that should be displayed. A value of zero forces CardView to display as many columns as space will allow.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_MaxCardRows
data.value: Returns/sets the maximum number of rows of Cards that should be displayed. A value of zero forces CardView to display as many rows as space will allow.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_Orientation
data.value: Returns/sets whether Cards are arranged horizontally (left-to-right top-to-bottom) or vertically (top-to-bottom left-to-right).

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_Padding
data.value: Returns/sets the padding between the outermost cards and the bounds of the control.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_RepositionAnimation
data.value: Returns/sets a DoubleAnimationBase derived instance that should be used when animating Cards to new layout positions.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_ShouldAnimateCardPositioning
data.value: Returns/sets whether Cards should be animated into their new positions when the CardView is scrolled.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_ShouldCollapseCards
data.value: Returns/sets whether Cards should be collapsed.

data.name: LD_CardViewSettings_P_ShouldCollapseEmptyCells
data.value: Returns/sets whether cells whose value is determined to be empty (e.g. empty string/null for string, null for nullable types, and 0 for numeric types) will be collapsed and not displayed within the record.

data.name: LD_SummaryRecordContentArea_P_HasSummariesInCellArea
data.value: Indicates whether the cell are element has any summaries.

data.name: LD_RecordPresenter_P_IsInCard
data.value: Returns true if the RecordPresenter is being hosted by a CardViewCard in CardView

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_AllowHiding
data.value: Specifies if the user can show or hide the field.

data.name: LD_FieldSettings_P_CollapseWhenEmpty
data.value: Returns/sets whether Views that support the collapsing of cells should collapse cells associated with a Field when the cells contain empty values (e.g. empty string/null for string, null for nullable types, and 0 for numeric types).

data.name: LD_CardViewPanel_P_ViewSettings
data.value: Returns/set the CardViewSettings object for this CardViewPanel.

data.name: LD_CardViewCard_P_CollapseCardButtonVisibility
data.value: Returns/sets the Visibility of a button in the Card header which can be clicked by the end user to collapse a Card so it shows its header only.

data.name: LD_CardViewCard_P_CollapseEmptyCellsButtonVisibility
data.value: Returns/sets the Visibility of a button in the Card header which can be clicked by the end user to collapse cells that contain empty values (e.g. empty string/null for string, null for nullable types, and 0 for numeric types).

data.name: LD_CardViewCard_P_HasHeader
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the Header property has been set.

data.value: Gets/sets an object that will appear in the header of this card.

data.value: Gets/sets a selector to allow the application writer to assign different header templates for each card.

data.name: LD_CardViewCard_P_HeaderVisibility
data.value: Returns/sets the Visibiolity of the Card's Header.

data.name: LD_CardViewCard_P_IsAddRecord

data.name: LD_CardViewCard_P_IsCollapsed
data.value: Returns/sets whether the CardViewCard is collapsed to show only its header and not its content.

data.name: LD_CardViewCard_P_IsFilterRecord
data.value: Returns true if the associated Record is a Filter record. (read only)

data.name: LD_CardViewCard_P_IsSelected

data.name: LD_CardViewCard_P_ShouldCollapseEmptyCells
data.value: Returns/sets whether Cells contained in this CardViewCard should be collapsed if they contain empty values.

data.name: LD_DataPresenterCalculationSettingsBase_P_Formula
data.value: Specifies the formula to use to calculate the target's value.

data.name: LD_DataPresenterCalculationSettingsBase_P_ReferenceId
data.value: Identifies the object. Id is used to refer to the value of the associated object in other formulas.

data.name: LD_DataPresenterCalculationSettingsBase_P_TreatAsType
data.value: Specifies the type to treat the values of the associated object as. For example if the cell date type is string you may want to treat it as double when providing the value to the calculation engine for formula calculations.

data.name: LD_DataPresenterCalculationSettingsBase_P_TreatAsTypeName
data.value: Specifies the name of the type to treat the values of the associated object as. For example if the cell date type is string you may want to treat it as double when providing the value to the calculation engine for formula calculations.

data.name: LD_DataPresenterCalculationSettingsBase_P_ValueConverter
data.value: Specifies the converter to use to convert between the underlying value of the cell to the value that is used in calculations.

The XamDataCards control uses elements generated by the XamDataPresenterBase to display each item in the list.
